name: I've never seen snow - Ludum Dare 31
name_original: I've never seen snow - Ludum Dare 31
description:
Controls:

W A S D to move
Attack change direction
I J K L to attack(You can keept it pressed to attack faster)

This is a game about Christmas in Brazil.

We live in Brazil and grew up being encouraged to love and live with characters and situations that involve Christmas that are not ours!

Here in Brazil in December, all the big shops, streets and houses mimic a fake snow in the midst of a temperature of 40 degrees.

We celebrate a date that doesn't make sense for us and we call it tradition, this game shows the exhaustion of a child who doesn't understand why need to want things for Christmas and doesn't even understand where it's coming from the snow, because she never saw ...

at the same time she doesn't understand why her parents who are poor try to buy as much useless things that can in December.
